ss,bool,address,address)":{"details":"DO Rewards will be messed up if you do. (Only if want tokens are stored here.)","params":{"_allocPoint":"The number of allocation points for this pool (aka \"multiplier\")","_lib":"The address of the deployed library for this pool","_vault":"The contract address of the underlying vault","_want":"The address of the want token","_withUpdate":"Mass update all pools if set to true"}},"deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool","_wantAmt":"how much Want token to deposit","_weeksCommitted":"how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault"}},"depositFullService(uint256,uint256,address[],uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool to deposit into","_sourceTokens":"list of tokens to autoswap from ","_valueUSDC":"value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit","_weeksCommitted":"how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)"}},"getZorroPerBlock()":{"returns":{"_0":"Number of Zorro tokens per block"}},"inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256)":{"details":"Does not permit usage for the Zorro token","params":{"_amount":"token quantity","_token":"ERC20 token address"}},"massUpdatePools()":{"details":"Be careful of gas fees!"},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pendingZORRORewards(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_pid":"Index of pool","_user":"wallet address of user"},"returns":{"_0":"amount of Zorro rewards"}},"poolLength()":{"returns":{"_0":"Number of pools"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"set(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"params":{"_allocPoint":"The number of allocation points for this pool (aka \"multiplier\")","_pid":"The index of the pool ID","_withUpdate":"Mass update all pools if set to true"}},"stakedWantTokens(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_pid":"Index of pool","_user":"wallet address of user"},"returns":{"_0":"amount of staked Want tokens"}},"trancheLength(uint256,address)":{"params":{"_pid":"Index of pool","_user":"wallet address of user"},"returns":{"_0":"Number of tranches"}},"transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_fromPid":"index of pool FROM","_fromTrancheId":"index of tranche FROM","_toPid":"index of pool TO"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"updatePool(uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool"}},"withdraw(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool","_trancheId":"index of tranche","_wantAmt":"how much Want token to withdraw. If 0 is specified, function will only harvest Zorro rewards and not actually withdraw"},"returns":{"_0":"Amount of Want token withdrawn"}},"withdrawAll(uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool"}},"withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_pid":"index of pool to deposit into","_trancheId":"index of tranche","_wantAmt":"value in Want tokens to withdraw (0 will result in harvest and uint256(-1) will result in max value)"},"returns":{"_0":"Amount (in USDC) returned"}}},"title":"The main controller of the Zorro yield farming protocol. Used for cash flow operations (deposit/withdrawal), managing vaults, and rewards allocations, among other things.","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"add(uint256,address,bool,address,address)":{"notice":"Adds a new pool. Can only be called by the owner."},"deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Want tokens moved from user -> ZORROFarm (ZORRO allocation) -> Strat (compounding)"},"depositFullService(uint256,uint256,address[],uint256)":{"notice":"Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)"},"getZorroPerBlock()":{"notice":"Determine the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters"},"inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256)":{"notice":"For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck"},"massUpdatePools()":{"notice":"Updates reward variables of all pools"},"pendingZORRORewards(uint256,address)":{"notice":"View function to see pending ZORRO on frontend."},"poolLength()":{"notice":"Number of pools in the Zorro protocol"},"set(uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Update the given pool's ZORRO allocation point. Can only be called by the owner."},"stakedWantTokens(uint256,address)":{"notice":"View function to see staked Want tokens on frontend."},"trancheLength(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool"},"transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault"},"updatePool(uint256)":{"notice":"Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date."},"withdraw(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw LP tokens from MasterChef."},"withdrawAll(uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool"},"withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws funds from a pool and converts the Want token into documentation.text:
@notice Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool
 @param _pid index of pool

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "!safe to use Zorro token in func inCaseTokensGetStuck"

arguments.value: !safe to use Zorro token in func inCaseTokensGetStuck

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "!safe to use Zorro token in func inCaseTokensGetStuck"

add(uint256,address,bool,address,address.details: DO NOT add the same LP token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do. (Only if want tokens are stored here.)

params._allocPoint: The number of allocation points for this pool (aka "multiplier")
params._lib: The address of the deployed library for this pool
params._vault: The contract address of the underlying vault
params._want: The address of the want token
params._withUpdate: Mass update all pools if set to true

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault

params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._sourceTokens: list of tokens to autoswap from
params._valueUSDC: value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)

returns._0: Number of Zorro tokens per block

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).details: Does not permit usage for the Zorro token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._allocPoint: The number of allocation points for this pool (aka "multiplier")
params._pid: The index of the pool ID
params._withUpdate: Mass update all pools if set to true

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to withdraw. If 0 is specified, function will only harvest Zorro rewards and not actually withdraw

params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._wantAmt: value in Want tokens to withdraw (0 will result in harvest and uint256(-1) will result in max value)

devdoc.title: The main controller of the Zorro yield farming protocol. Used for cash flow operations (deposit/withdrawal), managing vaults, and rewards allocations, among other things.

add(uint256,address,bool,address,address.notice: Adds a new pool. Can only be called by the owner.

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Want tokens moved from user -> ZORROFarm (ZORRO allocation) -> Strat (compounding)

depositFullService(uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)

getZorroPerBlock().notice: Determine the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).notice: For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck

massUpdatePools().notice: Updates reward variables of all pools

pendingZORRORewards(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending ZORRO on frontend.

poolLength().notice: Number of pools in the Zorro protocol

set(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Update the given pool's ZORRO allocation point. Can only be called by the owner.

stakedWantTokens(uint256,address).notice: View function to see staked Want tokens on frontend.

trancheLength(uint256,address).notice: Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool

transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.

withdrawAll(uint256).notice: Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool

withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Withdraws funds from a pool and converts the Want token into USDC
